Name: Rogue Bots
About the game: Rogue bots is a third-person action game set in an abandoned sci-fi facility. You play as a robot who has been activated for a purpose. Explore the facility to find out what happened. Work with others to stop the bots and power up the facility again. The facility is overrun by rogue bots, attacking anyone on sight. If you want to survive you have to find the tools to deal with the bots. Fortunately, the bot you control is the latest in a long line of battle-ready bots. It is compatible with various modules which give it an edge by granting it various abilities. Discover new abilities and weapons to deal with the bots. Instant switch weapons. Acquired weapons can be disintegrated instantly allowing you to quickly switch to another weapon. Keep the pressure on by raining bullets on the bots. Power up to use your abilities. You have limited power and every ability you use drains it. Stand near generators to recharge or destroy bots to get cells. Abilities like cyber blast and dash are essential to get you out of a deadlock. Mix it up and play. Drones shoot projectiles in a wide area. Use power-based weapons to nullify their attacks or combine power with conventional firearms like the rifle to fire multiple bullets at once which is essential for crowd control. Test your skills in survival. Face waves of bots in survival mode. Get points for each bot destroyed and use them to upgrade weapons and unlock abilities. Your choice of weapons at the early stages determines your chances of survival. Note: Rogue bots has a short campaign that can be completed in an hour (excluding survival mode). What the game offers is a shoot-em-up experience packaged with a simple story that aims to give you the feeling of fun through risk and reward gameplay and thrilling encounters where you have to always be on the move and find ways to deal with the enemies.
